title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Matt Mosley on Cowboys Draft Pushback, Lincoln Riley Critics
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Matt Mosley on Cowboys Draft Pushback, Lincoln Riley Critics
description:
First, it’s Fake Questions, Real Answers, (3:00) including if Colin agrees with JJ Reddick’s rebuke of ‘Mad Dog’ Russo for saying Draymond Green should just ‘shut up and play’, what’s behind the ratings spike of the LeBron-less Playoffs, if Ryan Tannehill should mentor Malik Willis, if Colin is responsible for keeping Lincoln Riley in the headlines, and what lesson NBA could learn from MLB about player rest. 

Then, longtime Cowboys columnist - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley and Colin discuss if Lincoln Riley deserves the blowback over Biletnikoff winner Jordan Addison potentially transferring to USC (18:00), if the Cowboys over drafted their 1st round pick OT Tyler Smith (24:00), why the Mavericks can’t land top line free agents (32:00), how the media has evolved into athletes controlling their own narrative like Draymond (43:00), and what’s behind the NBA playoffs ratings spike (52:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
